name: E. Den
description:
Hello all!

This is my first attempt at creating a game, which I submitted for the Newgrounds/Construct2 future2030 gamejam.

You are Wald-0, a robot left behind after humanity to try to reassemble and protect life after planet Earth has been reduced to a gloppy wasteland. Race the timer (unless you're on endless mode) and prepare the Environmental Den for the children!

Move about to collect and build materials to keep life going!

Buttons:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

S - Interact with certain objects (stairwells, workbench, etc.)

Left Mouse Button - Click buttons/Turn in tasks

Right Mouse Button - Swing hammer

If you like this, follow me on Twitter and Facebook!

- Scott
